mapper.select: select BRANDNAME,SPEC,SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) DODATE,sum(AMOUNT) AMOUNT from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) between #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} group by SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7)
select DATEDIFF(#{DODATE},(select MIN(DODATE) from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC})) from dual
select DATEDIFF(#{DODATE1},#{DODATE}) from dual
SELECT CYCLE,DURATION,SALEAMOUNT,INCOME,MAORI,OVERAMOUNT,SHARE,TURNOVER_TIME FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_PRODUCT_CYCLE_INFO WHERE BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC}
SELECT PERIOD_DIFF(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{DODATE},'-01'),'%Y%m'), DATE_FORMAT((SELECT MIN(DODATE) FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D WHERE BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC}),'%Y%m')) FROM DUAL
SELECT PERIOD_DIFF(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{DODATE1},'-01'),'%Y%m'), DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{DODATE},'-01'),'%Y%m')) FROM DUAL

SELECT BRANDNAME,SPEC,DODATE,SUM(AMOUNT) AS AMOUNT FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D WHERE DODATE BETWEEN (SELECT DATE_ADD((SELECT MIN(DODATE) FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D WHERE BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME2} and SPEC=#{SPEC2}), INTERVAL (SELECT DATEDIFF(#{DODATE},(SELECT MIN(#{DODATE}) FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D WHERE BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC})) FROM DUAL) DAY) FROM DUAL) AND (SELECT DATE_ADD((SELECT MIN(#{DODATE}) FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D WHERE BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME2} and SPEC=#{SPEC2}), INTERVAL (SELECT DATEDIFF(#{DODATE1},(SELECT MIN(#{DODATE}) FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D WHERE BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC})) FROM DUAL) DAY) FROM DUAL) AND BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME2} and SPEC=#{SPEC2} GROUP BY DODATE

SELECT BRANDNAME,SPEC,SUBSTR(dodate,1,7) DODATE,SUM(AMOUNT) AMOUNT FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D WHERE SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) BETWEEN #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME2} and SPEC=#{SPEC2} GROUP BY SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7)

select BRANDNAME,SPEC,DODATE,sum(AMOUNT) as AMOUNT from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where DODATE between (select date_add((select min(#{DODATE}) from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME1} and SPEC=#{SPEC1}), interval (select datediff(#{DODATE},(select min(#{DODATE}) from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC})) from dual) day) from dual) and (select date_add((select min(#{DODATE}) from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME1} and SPEC=#{SPEC1}), interval (select datediff(#{DODATE1},(select min(#{DODATE}) from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC})) from dual) day) from dual) and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME1} and SPEC=#{SPEC1} group by DODATE

SELECT BRANDNAME,SPEC,SUBSTR(dodate,1,7) DODATE,SUM(AMOUNT) AMOUNT FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D WHERE SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) BETWEEN #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME1} and SPEC=#{SPEC1} GROUP BY SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7)
select BRANDNAME,SPEC,DODATE,avg(SALEPRICE) SALEPRICE from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where DODATE between #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} group by DODATE
select BRANDNAME,SPEC,DODATE,OPENPRICE from ZD_RESULT_OPER_OPEN_PRICE_FINAL_D where DODATE between #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC}
select BRANDNAME,SPEC,DODATE,OPENPRICE from ZD_RESULT_OPER_OPEN_PRICE_FINAL_D where DODATE between #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME1} and SPEC=#{SPEC1} GROUP BY DODATE

select BRANDNAME,SPEC,SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) DODATE,avg(SALEPRICE) SALEPRICE from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) between #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} group by SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7)

SELECT BRANDNAME,SPEC,SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) DODATE,AVG(OPENPRICE ) OPENPRICE FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_OPEN_PRICE_FINAL_D WHERE SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) BETWEEN #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} GROUP BY SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7)

SELECT BRANDNAME,SPEC,SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) DODATE,AVG(OPENPRICE ) OPENPRICE FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_OPEN_PRICE_FINAL_D WHERE SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) BETWEEN #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME1} and SPEC=#{SPEC1} GROUP BY SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7)
select BRANDNAME,SPEC,DODATE,sum(AMOUNTPRICE) AMOUNTPRICE from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where DODATE between #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} group by DODATE

select BRANDNAME,SPEC,DODATE,sum(AMOUNTPRICE) AMOUNTPRICE from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where DODATE between (select date_add((select min(#{DODATE}) from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME2} and SPEC=#{SPEC2}), interval (select datediff(#{DODATE},(select min(#{DODATE}) from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC})) from dual) day) from dual) and (select date_add((select min(#{DODATE}) from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME2} and SPEC=#{SPEC2}), interval (select datediff(#{DODATE1},(select min(#{DODATE}) from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC})) from dual) day) from dual) and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME2} and SPEC=#{SPEC2} group by DODATE

select BRANDNAME,SPEC,DODATE,sum(AMOUNTPRICE) AMOUNTPRICE from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where DODATE between (select date_add((select min(#{DODATE}) from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME1} and SPEC=#{SPEC1}), interval (select datediff(#{DODATE},(select min(#{DODATE}) from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC})) from dual) day) from dual) and (select date_add((select min(#{DODATE}) from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME1} and SPEC=#{SPEC1}), interval (select datediff(#{DODATE1},(select min(#{DODATE}) from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC})) from dual) day) from dual) and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME1} and SPEC=#{SPEC1} group by DODATE

select BRANDNAME,SPEC,SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) DODATE,sum(AMOUNTPRICE) AMOUNTPRICE from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) between #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} group by SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7)

SELECT BRANDNAME,SPEC,SUBSTR(dodate,1,7) dodate,SUM(AMOUNTPRICE) AMOUNTPRICE FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D WHERE SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) BETWEEN #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME2} and SPEC=#{SPEC2} GROUP BY SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7)

SELECT BRANDNAME,SPEC,SUBSTR(dodate,1,7) dodate,SUM(AMOUNTPRICE) AMOUNTPRICE FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D WHERE SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) BETWEEN #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME1} and SPEC=#{SPEC1} GROUP BY SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7)

SELECT BRANDNAME,SPEC,AREANAME,DODATE,SUM(REAL_TIME_AMOUNT) REAL_TIME_AMOUNT FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_STOCK_AREA_D WHERE DODATE BETWEEN #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} GROUP BY AREANAME ORDER BY REAL_TIME_AMOUNT DESC

SELECT BRANDNAME,SPEC,SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7),AREANAME, SUM(REAL_TIME_AMOUNT) REAL_TIME_AMOUNT FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_STOCK_AREA_D WHERE SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) BETWEEN #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} GROUP BY AREANAME ORDER BY REAL_TIME_AMOUNT DESC

select BRANDNAME,SPEC,DODATE,sum(REAL_TIME_AMOUNT) REAL_TIME_AMOUNT from ZD_RESULT_OPER_STOCK_AREA_D where DODATE between #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} group by DODATE

SELECT BRANDNAME,SPEC,DODATE,SUM(REAL_TIME_AMOUNT) REAL_TIME_AMOUNT FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_STOCK_AREA_D WHERE DODATE BETWEEN (SELECT DATE_ADD( #{DODATE} , INTERVAL -1 YEAR) FROM DUAL) AND (SELECT DATE_ADD( #{DODATE1} , INTERVAL -1 YEAR) FROM DUAL) AND BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} GROUP BY DODATE

SELECT BRANDNAME,SPEC,SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) DODATE,SUM(REAL_TIME_AMOUNT) REAL_TIME_AMOUNT FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_STOCK_AREA_D WHERE SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) BETWEEN (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(CONCAT(#{DODATE},'-01'), INTERVAL -1 YEAR),'%Y-%m') FROM DUAL) AND (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(CONCAT(#{DODATE1},'-01'), INTERVAL -1 YEAR),'%Y-%m') FROM DUAL) AND BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} GROUP BY SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7)
select BRANDNAME,SPEC,DODATE,sum(SALECOSTPRICE) SALECOSTPRICE from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where DODATE between #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} group by DODATE

select BRANDNAME,SPEC,DODATE,sum(SALECOSTPRICE) SALECOSTPRICE from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D WHERE DODATE BETWEEN (SELECT DATE_ADD((SELECT MIN(DODATE) FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D WHERE BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME2} and SPEC=#{SPEC2}), INTERVAL (SELECT DATEDIFF(#{DODATE},(SELECT MIN(#{DODATE}) FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D WHERE BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC})) FROM DUAL) DAY) FROM DUAL) AND (SELECT DATE_ADD((SELECT MIN(#{DODATE}) FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D WHERE BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME2} and SPEC=#{SPEC2}), INTERVAL (SELECT DATEDIFF(#{DODATE1},(SELECT MIN(#{DODATE}) FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D WHERE BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC})) FROM DUAL) DAY) FROM DUAL) AND BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME2} and SPEC=#{SPEC2} GROUP BY DODATE

select BRANDNAME,SPEC,DODATE,sum(SALECOSTPRICE) SALECOSTPRICE from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where DODATE between (select date_add((select min(#{DODATE}) from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME1} and SPEC=#{SPEC1}), interval (select datediff(#{DODATE},(select min(#{DODATE}) from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC})) from dual) day) from dual) and (select date_add((select min(#{DODATE}) from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME1} and SPEC=#{SPEC1}), interval (select datediff(#{DODATE1},(select min(#{DODATE}) from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC})) from dual) day) from dual) and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME1} and SPEC=#{SPEC1} group by DODATE

select BRANDNAME,SPEC,SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) DODATE,sum(SALECOSTPRICE) SALECOSTPRICE from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) between #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} group by SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7)

SELECT BRANDNAME,SPEC,SUBSTR(dodate,1,7) dodate,SUM(SALECOSTPRICE) SALECOSTPRICE FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D WHERE SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) BETWEEN #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME2} and SPEC=#{SPEC2} GROUP BY SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7)

SELECT BRANDNAME,SPEC,SUBSTR(dodate,1,7) dodate,SUM(SALECOSTPRICE) SALECOSTPRICE FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D WHERE SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) BETWEEN #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME1} and SPEC=#{SPEC1} GROUP BY SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7)
select BRANDNAME,SPEC,DODATE,avg(PRO_SHARE) PRO_SHARE from ZD_RESULT_OPER_SHARE_AREA_D where DODATE between #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} group by DODATE

select BRANDNAME,SPEC,SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) DODATE,avg(PRO_SHARE) PRO_SHARE from ZD_RESULT_OPER_SHARE_AREA_D where SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) between #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} group by SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7)
select BRANDNAME,SPEC,DODATE,count(1) cnt from ZD_RESULT_OPER_OVER_CUST_AREA_D where DODATE between #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} and cnt>3 group by DODATE

select BRANDNAME,SPEC,SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) DODATE,count(1) cnt from ZD_RESULT_OPER_OVER_CUST_AREA_D where SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) between #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} and cnt>3 group by SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7)
select BRANDNAME,SPEC,DODATE,avg(LOCAL_RATIO) LOCAL_RATIO from ZD_RESULT_OPER_ORDER_AREA_D where DODATE between #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} group by DODATE
select BRANDNAME,SPEC,DODATE,avg(REMOTE_RATIO) REMOTE_RATIO from ZD_RESULT_OPER_ORDER_AREA_D where DODATE between #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} group by DODATE
select BRANDNAME,SPEC,DODATE,avg(YK_RATIO) YK_RATIO from ZD_RESULT_OPER_ORDER_AREA_D where DODATE between #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} group by DODATE

select BRANDNAME,SPEC,SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) DODATE,avg(LOCAL_RATIO) LOCAL_RATIO from ZD_RESULT_OPER_ORDER_AREA_D where SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) between #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} group by SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7)

select BRANDNAME,SPEC,SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) DODATE,avg(REMOTE_RATIO) REMOTE_RATIO from ZD_RESULT_OPER_ORDER_AREA_D where SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) between #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} group by SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7)

select BRANDNAME,SPEC,SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) DODATE,avg(YK_RATIO) YK_RATIO from ZD_RESULT_OPER_ORDER_AREA_D where SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) between #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} group by SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7)

SELECT B.fiveName fiveName,B.savenName savenName, SUM(AMOUNT) AMOUNT ,A.LINECODE LINECODE,A.PORTCODE PORTCODE FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_LINE_D A INNER JOIN AREA_PORT B ON A.`LINECODE`=B.`fivePort` AND A.`PORTCODE`=B.`savenPort` WHERE DODATE BETWEEN #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} GROUP BY DODATE,LINECODE,PORTCODE

SELECT B.fiveName,B.`savenName`, SUM(AMOUNT) AMOUNT FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_LINE_D A INNER JOIN AREA_PORT B ON A.`LINECODE`=B.`fivePort` AND A.`PORTCODE`=B.`savenPort` WHERE DODATE BETWEEN #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} GROUP BY DODATE,LINECODE,PORTCODE

select BRANDNAME,SPEC,DODATE,sum(AMOUNT) AMOUNT,sum(SALEPRICE) SALEPRICE,sum(SALECOSTPRICE) SALECOSTPRICE,sum(AMOUNTPRICE) AMOUNTPRICE from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where DODATE between #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} group by DODATE

select BRANDNAME,SPEC,DODATE,sum(AMOUNT) AMOUNT,sum(SALEPRICE) SALEPRICE,sum(SALECOSTPRICE) SALECOSTPRICE,sum(AMOUNTPRICE) AMOUNTPRICE from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where DODATE between (select date_add( #{DODATE} , interval -1 year) from dual) and (select date_add( #{DODATE1} , interval -1 year) from dual) and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} group by DODATE

select BRANDNAME,SPEC,SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) DODATE,sum(AMOUNT) AMOUNT,sum(SALEPRICE) SALEPRICE,sum(SALECOSTPRICE) SALECOSTPRICE,sum(AMOUNTPRICE) AMOUNTPRICE from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) between #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} group by SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7)

select BRANDNAME,SPEC,SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) DODATE,sum(AMOUNT) AMOUNT,sum(SALEPRICE) SALEPRICE,sum(SALECOSTPRICE) SALECOSTPRICE,sum(AMOUNTPRICE) AMOUNTPRICE from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) between (select DATE_FORMAT(date_add(CONCAT(#{DODATE},'-01'), interval -1 year),'%Y-%m') from dual) and (select DATE_FORMAT(date_add(CONCAT(#{DODATE1},'-01'), interval -1 year),'%Y-%m') from dual) and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} group by SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7)

select BRANDNAME,SPEC,DODATE,AREANAME,sum(AMOUNT) AMOUNT,sum(SALEPRICE) SALEPRICE,sum(SALECOSTPRICE) SALECOSTPRICE,sum(AMOUNTPRICE) AMOUNTPRICE from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where DODATE between #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} group by AREANAME ORDER BY AMOUNT DESC

select BRANDNAME,SPEC,SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) DODATE,AREANAME,sum(AMOUNT) AMOUNT,sum(SALEPRICE) SALEPRICE,sum(SALECOSTPRICE) SALECOSTPRICE,sum(AMOUNTPRICE) AMOUNTPRICE from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) between #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} group by AREANAME ORDER BY AMOUNT DESC

select BRANDNAME,SPEC,SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) DODATE,AREANAME,sum(AMOUNT) AMOUNT from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) between #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} group by SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7),AREANAME

SELECT B.fiveName fiveName,B.savenName savenName, SUM(SALEPRICE) SALEPRICE ,SUM(AMOUNTPRICE) AMOUNTPRICE ,SUM(SALECOSTPRICE) SALECOSTPRICE, A.LINECODE LINECODE,A.PORTCODE PORTCODE FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_LINE_D A INNER JOIN AREA_PORT B ON A.`LINECODE`=B.`fivePort` AND A.`PORTCODE`=B.`savenPort` WHERE DODATE BETWEEN #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} GROUP BY DODATE,LINECODE,PORTCODE

SELECT B.fiveName,B.`savenName`, SUM(SALEPRICE) SALEPRICE,SUM(AMOUNTPRICE) AMOUNTPRICE ,SUM(SALECOSTPRICE) SALECOSTPRICE FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_LINE_D A INNER JOIN AREA_PORT B ON A.`LINECODE`=B.`fivePort` AND A.`PORTCODE`=B.`savenPort` WHERE DODATE BETWEEN #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} GROUP BY DODATE,LINECODE,PORTCODE
SELECT BRANDNAME,SPEC,DODATE,AVG(PRO_SHARE) PRO_SHARE FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_SHARE_AREA_D WHERE DODATE BETWEEN #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} GROUP BY DODATE

SELECT BRANDNAME,SPEC,DODATE,AVG(PRO_SHARE) PRO_SHARE FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_SHARE_AREA_D WHERE DODATE BETWEEN (SELECT DATE_ADD( #{DODATE} , INTERVAL -1 YEAR) FROM DUAL) AND (SELECT DATE_ADD( #{DODATE1} , INTERVAL -1 YEAR) FROM DUAL) AND BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} GROUP BY DODATE

SELECT BRANDNAME,SPEC,SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) DODATE,AVG(PRO_SHARE) PRO_SHARE FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_SHARE_AREA_D WHERE SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) BETWEEN #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} GROUP BY SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7)

select BRANDNAME,SPEC,SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) DODATE,AVG(PRO_SHARE) PRO_SHARE from ZD_RESULT_OPER_LSLJ_AREA_D where SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) between (select DATE_FORMAT(date_add(CONCAT(#{DODATE},'-01'), interval -1 year),'%Y-%m') from dual) and (select DATE_FORMAT(date_add(CONCAT(#{DODATE1},'-01'), interval -1 year),'%Y-%m') from dual) and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} group by SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7)

SELECT BRANDNAME,SPEC,DODATE,AREANAME,AVG(PRO_SHARE) PRO_SHARE FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_SHARE_AREA_D WHERE DODATE BETWEEN #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} GROUP BY AREANAME ORDER BY PRO_SHARE DESC

SELECT BRANDNAME,SPEC,SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) DODATE,AREANAME,AVG(PRO_SHARE) PRO_SHARE FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_SHARE_AREA_D WHERE SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) BETWEEN #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} GROUP BY AREANAME ORDER BY PRO_SHARE DESC
SELECT BRANDNAME,SPEC,DODATE,cnt FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_OVER_CUST_AREA_D WHERE DODATE BETWEEN #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} GROUP BY DODATE

SELECT BRANDNAME,SPEC,DODATE,cnt FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_OVER_CUST_AREA_D WHERE DODATE BETWEEN (SELECT DATE_ADD( #{DODATE} , INTERVAL -1 YEAR) FROM DUAL) AND (SELECT DATE_ADD( #{DODATE1} , INTERVAL -1 YEAR) FROM DUAL) AND BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} GROUP BY DODATE

SELECT BRANDNAME,SPEC,SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) DODATE,SUM(cnt) cnt FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_OVER_CUST_AREA_D WHERE SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) BETWEEN #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} GROUP BY SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7)

SELECT BRANDNAME,SPEC,SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) DODATE,SUM(cnt) cnt FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_OVER_CUST_AREA_D WHERE SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) BETWEEN (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(CONCAT(#{DODATE},'-01'), INTERVAL -1 YEAR),'%Y-%m') FROM DUAL) AND (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(CONCAT(#{DODATE1},'-01'), INTERVAL -1 YEAR),'%Y-%m') FROM DUAL) AND BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} GROUP BY SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7)

SELECT BRANDNAME,SPEC,DODATE,AREANAME,cnt FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_OVER_CUST_AREA_D WHERE DODATE BETWEEN #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} GROUP BY AREANAME ORDER BY cnt DESC

SELECT BRANDNAME,SPEC,SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) DODATE,AREANAME,SUM(cnt) cnt FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_OVER_CUST_AREA_D WHERE SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) BETWEEN #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} GROUP BY AREANAME ORDER BY cnt DESC
SELECT BRANDNAME,SPEC,DODATE,LOCAL_RATIO FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_ORDER_AREA_D WHERE DODATE BETWEEN #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} GROUP BY DODATE

SELECT BRANDNAME,SPEC,DODATE,LOCAL_RATIO FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_ORDER_AREA_D WHERE DODATE BETWEEN (SELECT DATE_ADD( #{DODATE} , INTERVAL -1 YEAR) FROM DUAL) AND (SELECT DATE_ADD( #{DODATE1} , INTERVAL -1 YEAR) FROM DUAL) AND BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} GROUP BY DODATE

SELECT BRANDNAME,SPEC,SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) DODATE,SUM(LOCAL_RATIO) LOCAL_RATIO FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_ORDER_AREA_D WHERE SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) BETWEEN #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} GROUP BY SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7)

SELECT BRANDNAME,SPEC,SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) DODATE,SUM(LOCAL_RATIO) LOCAL_RATIO FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_ORDER_AREA_D WHERE SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) BETWEEN (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(CONCAT(#{DODATE},'-01'), INTERVAL -1 YEAR),'%Y-%m') FROM DUAL) AND (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(CONCAT(#{DODATE1},'-01'), INTERVAL -1 YEAR),'%Y-%m') FROM DUAL) AND BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} GROUP BY SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7)

SELECT BRANDNAME,SPEC,DODATE,AREANAME,LOCAL_RATIO FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_ORDER_AREA_D WHERE DODATE BETWEEN #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} GROUP BY AREANAME ORDER BY LOCAL_RATIO DESC

SELECT BRANDNAME,SPEC,SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) DODATE,AREANAME,SUM(LOCAL_RATIO) LOCAL_RATIO FROM ZD_RESULT_OPER_ORDER_AREA_D WHERE SUBSTR(DODATE,1,7) BETWEEN #{DODATE} and #{DODATE1} and BRANDNAME=#{BRANDNAME} and SPEC=#{SPEC} GROUP BY AREANAME ORDER BY LOCAL_RATIO DESC
